short_summary: Dredging and ocean disposal of dredged materials at Tabusintac Gully
description: The scope of work includes but is not limited to the provision of all labour and equipment required to perform dredging and ocean disposal of dredged materials as specified herein at Tabusintac Gully, NB Channel No.4, Inside (Area "A") and Outside (Area "B") sections All work is to be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.123321.001.
full_summary:
================================

**Clear Title and Summary**
-----------------------------

**Channel Dredging 2023 Tabusintac Gully, New Brunswick**
===========================================================

### Reference Number:
WS3823061589-Doc3826166235

### Solicitation Number:
WS3823061589

### Publication Date:
2023-01-16

### Tender Closing Date:
2023-02-08T14:00:00

### Amendment Date:
2023-01-26

### Expected Contract Start and End Dates:
2023-02-08 to [no end date specified]

### Technical Details
---------------------

#### Services Required
* Dredging services (UNSPSC 72141206)

#### Work Location
* Tabusintac Gully, New Brunswick

#### Scope of Work
The contractual obligation includes, but is not limited to, providing labor and equipment necessary to perform dredging and ocean disposal of dredged materials as specified in the project plans (PWGSC Project Number R.123321.001) for Channel No. 4.

#### Timeline
The project is to be completed within 30 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

#### Estimated Cost
The estimated cost for this opportunity falls within the range of $500,001 to $1,000,000 (HST included).

#### Tendering Information
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price proposal.

#### Contact Information
To obtain the documents and learn more about the tender, please visit the [notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15141984).

#### Government Requirements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Standard bid and contract security for construction is required.

#### Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Points of Contact
* Sonia Stockman, Contracting Manager (sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) to inquire about the tender.  Please note that the contact phone and fax numbers are not available.  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada is the address of the contracting entity.
